Text:
Hi, thanks for sharing.

Personally though, I find the material in these documentarys great, but the editing is fucking awful! This really is one of the worst examples of the "MTV disease" I have ever seen. Not one sinle clip is longer that 4 seconds and stupid, and non contributing, graphics flash past every 2 seconds. If you have seen the film "Reality Bites" you will know what I am talking about. ;-)

Anyway, it's simply annoying and a shame on the excellent material that they have dug up.
//Jocke

Thank you bandit999.
You rule the punk waves!
